body.header: Look carefully at the line graph and the table and complete each sentence by choosing the correct ending.

ol.li:
The proportion of men who were found guilty or cautioned in 2000 ....
declined steadily throughout the year
increased steadily with age
was greater than the proportion of women

In 2000 over 7 per cent of all ....
18-year-old males were offenders
male offenders were 18 years old
18-year-olds were offenders

In 2000 ....
more crimes were committed by 20-year-old women than by 30-year-old women
a greater percentage of 20-year-old women than 30-year-old women committed crimes
more 20-year-old women than 30-year-old women committed crimes

In 2000 ....
no one over the age of 70 was found guilty or cautioned
the number of 70-year-old offenders fell sharply
only a tiny proportion of people over the age of 70 were found guilty or cautioned

In 2000 approximately 0.5 per cent of ....
30-year-old offenders were women
30-year-old women were offenders
crimes were committed by 30-year-old women

Between 1999 and 2001 ....
there was an overall decrease in the number of recorded crimes
the overall number of recorded crimes remained the same
there was an overall increase in the number of recorded crimes

Between 1999 and 2001 there was a reduction in ....
only a few types of crime
most types of crime
all types of crime

Over the period 2000-2001 the total number of thefts, including car thefts, stood at just over ....
2,000
2 million
3 million

Over the period 2000-2001 ....
nearly half of all thefts involved motor vehicles
over half of all thefts were thefts of motor vehicles
the majority of thefts were thefts from vehicles

Between 2000 and 2001 ....
fewer people were arrested than between 1999 and 2000
fewer offenders were cautioned or found guilty than between 1999 and 2000
fewer crimes were recorded than between 1999 and 2000
